cardOfDay.title: Card of the Day
cardOfDay.description: Find out what awaits you today

love.title: Love Divination
love.subtitle: Unlock the secrets of your heart
love.tipsTitle: How to get an accurate prediction:
tips: Focus on a specific love question
Keep in mind the image of a loved one or desired relationship
Click the "Start" button when you feel ready
love.footer: Love is the most powerful magical ritual. Believe in your luck!
predictions: Your heart will soon meet a kindred spirit. Be open to new acquaintances in unexpected places.
The love you seek is already close. Pay attention to those who have always been with you.
You are awaiting a romantic adventure that will change your perception of love.
Harmony in relationships will come when you learn to express your true feelings.
Solitude is a time for self-discovery. Love yourself, and love will find you.

money.title: Money Divination
money.subtitle: Discover financial opportunities
tips: Believe in your ability to earn
Invest not only money but also time in knowledge
money.footer: Money is energy. Direct its flow into your life!
predictions: Financial success awaits you in the near future. Pay attention to unexpected opportunities.
Your investments will soon bear fruit. Be patient in financial matters.
A new source of income will appear from an unexpected side. Be open to collaboration.
Financial stability will come after you put your current affairs in order.
Money will come to you through creative activity. Don't be afraid to monetize your talents.

career.title: Career Divination
career.subtitle: Conquer professional heights
career.cardLoading: The path to success is opening...
career.footer: Your professional success is a reflection of your efforts and self-belief!
predictions: You will have a career growth in the coming months. Be prepared for a new position.
Professional success will come through learning and self-development.
Colleagues will appreciate your ideas. Don't be afraid to offer innovative solutions.
Management will notice you. Show initiative in important projects.
A new professional opportunity will appear through business connections.

cardOfDay.title: Card of the Day
cardOfDay.subtitle: Prediction for today
tips: Start the day with a positive attitude
Be attentive to the signs of fate
cardOfDay.footer: Today is a canvas, and you are the artist of your destiny!
predictions: Today will bring unexpected meetings. Be open to communication.
Your intuition is especially strong today. Trust your inner voice.
Today is the perfect day to start new projects. Act boldly!
You will have pleasant surprises. Stay in a good mood.
Today will bring clarity to important issues. Pay attention to signs.

divinationTime.title: Time for divination
divinationTime.description: The best time for daily card divination is morning, after waking up.

dayEnergy.title: Energy of the day
dayEnergy.description: Each day carries unique energy. The card will help you tune into it.

dayJournal.title: Day journal
dayJournal.description: Write down your thoughts about the card throughout the day for better understanding.
